name: Shahidur Rahman Nayeem
title: Full Stack Developer
tagline: Building exceptional digital experiences with modern web technologies.
bio: Hi! I'm Shahidur Rahman Nayeem, a passionate full-stack developer with over 5 years of experience building web applications.

I specialize in creating seamless user experiences with modern technologies like React, Node.js, and cloud platforms. I love solving complex problems and transforming ideas into elegant, functional solutions.
